alert.note: Alert for Lamar Vicinity, Prowers County (Colorado) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued June 06 at 9:21PM MDT by NWS Pueblo
info.description: ...Strong thunderstorms will impact portions of central Prowers County through 945 PM MDT... At 920 PM MDT, Doppler radar was tracking strong thunderstorms along a line extending from 10 miles south of Lamar to near Holly. Movement was east at 45 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 30 mph and half inch hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Holly and Granada. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.50 IN MAX WIND GUST...30 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. A Severe Thunderstorm Watch remains in effect until 1000 PM MDT for southeastern Colorado.
